mapper.select: SELECT sr.role_code FROM sys_role sr INNER JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sr.id = sur.role_id WHERE sur.user_id = #{userId} AND sr.status = 1

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT su.id) FROM sys_user su INNER JOIN sys_user_role sur ON su.id = sur.user_id INNER JOIN sys_role sr ON sur.role_id = sr.id WHERE sr.role_code = #{roleCode} AND su.status = 1 AND sr.status = 1
